At E-Birr, we understand that success of MFS (Mobile Financial Services) depends on the flexibilty to create a strong financial services ecosystem 















NEWS FEED 




 




Tripartite Agreement Signed for Water Utility Billing ServiceAmbo and Woliso water bureaus signed an agreement for the collection of water bills through COOPay-EBIRR. 



New Services that E-Birr has integrated to its vast services platform  The customers of the Shoa Shopping Centre can now finalize transaction through E-Birr.
Payment of traffic penalty fines in Addis Ababa.
